0.title: CPU usage %
0.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }, 
filter:dt.entity.host in [fetch dt.entity.host | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd host.cpu.usage = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.cpu.usage)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name")
| sort host.cpu.usage desc
| limit 20

32.title: DNS query time
32.query:

| fieldsAdd host.dns.query_time = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.dns.query_time)`)

33.title: CPU usage %
33.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.cpu.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }, 
filter:dt.entity.host in [fetch dt.entity.host | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd host.cpu.usage = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.cpu.usage)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name")
| fields `Host`=name, `CPU Usage`=host.cpu.usage, Trend=`avg(dt.host.cpu.usage)`, `Host ID`=dt.entity.host, timeframe, interval
| sort `CPU Usage` desc
// | limit 10

34.title: Memory used %
34.query:
timeseries avg(dt.host.memory.usage), by: { dt.entity.host }, 
filter:dt.entity.host in [fetch dt.entity.host | filter in(managementZones, $ManagementZone) | fields id]
| fieldsAdd host.memory.usage = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.memory.usage)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name")
| fields `Host`=name, `Memory Usage`=host.memory.usage, Trend=`avg(dt.host.memory.usage)`, `Host ID`=dt.entity.host, timeframe, interval
| sort `Memory Usage` desc
// | limit 10

| fieldsAdd host.disk.used.percent = ArrayAvg(`avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent)`)
| fieldsAdd name=entityAttr(dt.entity.host, "entity.name")
| fields `Host`=name, `Disk Usage`=host.disk.used.percent, Trend=`avg(dt.host.disk.used.percent)`, `Host ID`=dt.entity.host, timeframe, interval
| sort `Disk Usage` desc
